once.js

  • opal/stdlib/nodejs/node_modules/glob/node_modules/once/test/once.js
  • Last modified: 2015-08-19 01:14:21 +0200

var test = require('tap').test var once = require('../once.js')

test('once', function (t) {

var f = 0
function fn (g) {
  t.equal(f, 0)
  f ++
  return f + g + this
}
fn.ownProperty = {}
var foo = once(fn)
t.equal(fn.ownProperty, foo.ownProperty)
t.notOk(foo.called)
for (var i = 0; i < 1E3; i++) {
  t.same(f, i === 0 ? 0 : 1)
  var g = foo.call(1, 1)
  t.ok(foo.called)
  t.same(g, 3)
  t.same(f, 1)
}
t.end()

})
